ques: The report shows a decrease in expenses; ________, profits have risen.
The project's costs may ________ the initial budget.
It is important not to ________ against any group based on race.
Effective leaders can ________ their team to achieve great results.
His estimate was surprisingly ________; he guessed the exact amount.
The detective tried to ________ the suspect's movements on the night of the crime.
The new design will ________ innovative features.
She is the ________ of several best-selling novels.
She is a highly ________ individual with a sharp mind.
His ________ decision-making process led to a successful outcome.
What ________s you to work hard and pursue your goals?
The historian attempted to ________ the origins of the ancient civilization.
The company plans to ________ eco-friendly practices into its operations.
Please do not ________ the recommended dosage of medication.
________, the study highlights the importance of early detection.
The ability to ________ between colors is essential for this job.
The robot's programming allows it to make ________ decisions.
The ________ of the book will be signing copies at the bookstore.
It's important to approach problems with a ________ mindset.
For the experiment to be valid, measurements must be ________.
It's challenging to ________ the history of this ancient artifact.
The coach's pep talk was intended to ________ the players.
His ________ approach to problem-solving is impressive.
She's an excellent manager; ________, she's a great team player.
Some animals can ________ between different scents.
The ________ of the article discusses the latest research.
She provided ________ arguments to support her viewpoint.
The detective relied on ________ information to solve the case.
The artist chose to ________ different styles in this painting.
The athlete's performance managed to ________ our expectations.
To improve efficiency, we need to ________ modern technology.
We should not ________ between people based on appearance.
The ________ of the play received critical acclaim.
________ing employees can lead to increased productivity.
The product is cost-effective, and, ________, it's environmentally friendly.
You need ________ data to support your research findings.
It's impressive to see a student ________ the teacher's knowledge.
To succeed in this field, you need to be both creative and ________.
A ________ discussion can lead to a resolution of conflicts.
Can you ________ the source of this unusual sound?
The weather forecast predicts rain, and, ________, strong winds.
Making ________ choices is a sign of maturity.
Setting clear objectives can ________ individuals to take action.
The ________ design of the device makes it user-friendly.
The ________ of the policy explained its purpose to the public.
Our sales ________ those of our competitors last quarter.
The scientist wanted to ________ the genetic history of the species.
The chef will ________ local ingredients into the menu.
The architect created an ________ blueprint of the building.
The law prohibits employers from ________ based on gender.
